## About Me

Hello! I'm **Matthew Rivera**, a Business Analytics graduate student at Baruch College's Zicklin School of Business, expected to graduate in June 2027. With a BBA in Computer Information Systems (Data Analytics concentration) completed in May 2024, I'm passionate about leveraging data to drive business insights and operational excellence.

### Background

My technical toolkit spans from traditional business intelligence tools like **Tableau** to advanced analytics with **Python, R, TensorFlow, and PyTorch**, with hands-on experience in machine learning projects including customer segmentation and recommendation systems.

### Current Focus & Goals

Through the STA 9750 Applied Statistics & Quantitative Analysis course, I'm advancing my expertise in:  
- **Advanced Statistical Modeling** for business applications  
- **Technical Communication** of complex analytical findings  
- **Reproducible Research Practices** using R and Quarto  
- **Peer Collaboration** in data science workflows

```{r}
#| echo: true

#| fig-cap: "Interactive map of Baruch College campus"
#| fig-alt: "Map centered on Baruch College at 55 Lexington Ave, NYC"
#| class-output: map-container

if(!require("leaflet")) install.packages("leaflet", quiet = TRUE)
library(leaflet)

baruch_longitude <- -73.98333
baruch_latitude  <- 40.75028

leaflet() |>
  addProviderTiles(providers$CartoDB.Positron) |>
  setView(baruch_longitude, baruch_latitude, zoom = 17) |>
  addMarkers(
    lng = baruch_longitude,
    lat = baruch_latitude,
    popup = "<b>Baruch College</b><br>55 Lexington Ave, NYC<br>
             <a href='https://www.baruch.cuny.edu' target='_blank'>Visit Website</a>",
    options = popupOptions(className = "custom-popup")
  )
```
